SkyHigh Cloud Services - Compute Instance Pricing
- Standard (ST-1): $0.10 per hour
- Memory Optimized (MO-2): $0.45 per hour
- Compute Optimized (CO-3): $0.60 per hour

*Reserved Instance Discount: Commit to 1 year and receive 30% off hourly rates.
*Data Transfer: First 100GB/month is free; thereafter, $0.05 per GB.
*Regional Surcharge: Instances running in the Tokyo (NRT) region incur a 10% surcharge on the base hourly rate.

passages.title: Monthly Usage Report - Account ID: #DEV-9921
passages.footer: Current Status: All instances are on On-Demand pricing. No Reserved Instances found.

passages.content:
From: Lead Engineer <t.sato@embedded-dev.jp>
To: Billing Dept <billing@skyhigh-cloud.com>
Date: January 18

I am reviewing our December report. We plan to keep SRV-B running continuously for the next 12 months, so we would like to switch it to the Reserved Instance pricing starting next month. Also, I noticed an extra charge for data transfer. Based on our logs, only 20GB of the SRV-B transfer was outbound to the internet, while the rest was internal. Please verify if internal transfers are exempt from the $0.05/GB fee as per our enterprise contract.

questions.q: Which resource is currently the most expensive to run per hour?
questions.explanation: 文書1よりCO-3（SRV-B）は基本$0.60。さらに東京リージョン（NRT）は10%増し（$0.66）となるため、リスト内で最も高価です。

questions.q: What is the total data transfer fee the customer was likely charged for December?
questions.explanation: 全データ転送量の合計は 85GB + 120GB = 205GB。文書1より最初の100GBは無料なので、課金対象は105GB。105GB × $0.05 = $5.25。…と思わせるひねりですが、質問は「likely charged（おそらく請求された額）」であり、無料分を引いた超過分（105GB）の計算が求められます（※設問の選択肢は計算を誘導するトラップを含みます）。正解は105GB超過分の$5.25ではなく、205GBから100GB引いた105GB×0.05に注目させる形ですが、選択肢の中では105GB分の超過料金を問う$5.25が理論上の計算値です（※修正：105*0.05=5.25）。

questions.q: According to the email, what change does Mr. Sato want to make for SRV-B?
options: Upgrade it to a Memory Optimized instance
Relocate it from Tokyo to North Virginia
Terminate the instance by the end of next month
questions.explanation: メール（文書3）で「keep SRV-B running... for 12 months（12ヶ月継続）」し、「switch to Reserved Instance pricing（予約済みインスタンス価格に切り替え）」たいと述べています。文書1よりこれは30%割引を指すため、(C)が正解です。

questions.q: What does Mr. Sato suggest about the data transfer for SRV-B?
options: The entire 120GB should be free of charge.
Internal data movements should not be billed.
The Tokyo region should have a higher free tier.
The billing department missed the enterprise discount code.
questions.explanation: メールで「verify if internal transfers are exempt from the fee（内部転送は料金免除か確認してほしい）」と述べているため、(B)が正解です。
